# Welcome

The goal of <i class="fab fa-github"></i> `r BiocStyle::Githubpkg("kevinrue/BiocChallengesTemplate")` is to provide a template for repositories that extend `r BiocStyle::Githubpkg("kevinrue/BiocChallenges")` and host thematic challenges contributed by and for the Bioconductor community.

More information is available in the `r BiocStyle::Githubpkg("kevinrue/BiocChallenges")` repository.
